markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Patron's Truth](/Feats.aspx?ID=5022) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 191 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[patron's gift](/Classes.aspx?ID=16)

</column>

---

You have mastered the greatest secrets of your patron’s magic and learned a fundamental truth about your patron, even if their identity still remains a mystery. You gain an additional 10th-rank spell slot.
name: Patron's Truth
